attributes.action: erect a monument to Nathianal Courthope.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man represented qualities that should inspire every briton.  Nathaniel Courthope, whose defiance and heroism, on the island of Run, surviving constant attack from the Dutch, with no food, and little ammunition, his men sick and dying. And yet his unwillingness to lie down and die and complete loyalty to his country should be an example to all.
